products.title: Shanky's Whip - Shot Glass Gift Pack - TRIPLE
products.body_html:
Shanky's Whip, ready to serve to friends!

THIS BUNDLE INCLUDES

  • (3) Bottles of Shanky's Whip 750ml
  • (12) Custom shot glasses
  • FREE SHIPPING

Shanky's Whip is a one-of-a-kind spirit from County Cavan, Ireland. Shanky's Whip combines the delicious flavors of vanilla and caramel with Irish whiskey to create a rich "you have to try it to believe it" taste.

Black. Smooth. Irish. A blend of all-natural flavors, Irish Whiskey, and Caramel. Delicious on its own, on the rocks, in a shot or any cocktail of your choosing.

Shanky's Whip is 33% Alc. / Vol - 66 Proof

products.title: Shanky's Whip Pour Spout Bundle - Triple
products.body_html:
THIS BUNDLE INCLUDES

  • (3) Bottles of Shanky's Whip 750ml
  • (3) Shanky's Whip Ostrich Head Pour Spouts
  • FREE SHIPPING

 

SHANKY'S WHIP

Shanky's Whip is a one-of-a-kind spirit from County Cavan, Ireland. Shanky's Whip combines the delicious flavors of vanilla and caramel with Irish whiskey to create a rich "you have to try it to believe it" taste.

Black. Smooth. Irish. A blend of all-natural flavors, Irish Whiskey, and Caramel. Delicious on its own, on the rocks, in a shot or any cocktail of your choosing.

 

Shanky's Whip is 33% Alc. / Vol - 66 Proof

 

POUR SPOUT

-3D molded ostrich head

-Debossed "Shanky's Whip" wordmark logo

-Rubber gasket at base of pourer that perfectly fits into Shanky's Whip bottles

-Durable and easy to use

-Liquid pours from beak

products.title: Shanky's Whip - "Party Animal"
products.body_html:
Do you love Shanky's Whip? 

Do you enjoy sharing Shanky's with friends?

Have you ever wanted to have your very own Shanky's emu along with exclusive merch?

If you answered "YES!" to these questions, this bundle is for you!

THIS BUNDLE INCLUDES

  • (12) Bottles of Shanky's Whip 750ml
  • (1) Shanky's Whip Life-Size Emu
  • (4) Shanky's Whip Shot Glasses
  • (1) Shanky's Whip Scarf
  • (1) Shanky's Whip Pennant
  • (1) Shanky's Whip Tote
  • (1) Shanky's Whip Bandana
  • FREE SHIPPING

Shanky's Whip is a one-of-a-kind spirit from County Cavan, Ireland. Shanky's whip combines the delicious flavors of vanilla and caramel with Irish whiskey to create a rich "you have to try it to believe it" taste.

Black. Smooth. Irish. A blend of all-natural flavors, Irish Whiskey, and Caramel. Delicious on its own, on the rocks, in a shot or any cocktail of your choosing.

(Disclaimer: The emu is not real.  It is a large stuffed animal.)

Emu stands 50" Tall
